heap.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a large untidy pile of things
heap.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: There was a heap of stones where the building used to be.
The envelopes for posting lay in a heap on her desk.
We piled the branches into heaps for burning.
heap.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: an old car that is in bad condition
heap.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to put a lot of things on top of each other in an untidy way
heap.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Jean heaped logs on the fire.
